Introduction

Dongyoon was a South Korean singer and songwriter under WYNN Entertainment. He made his official debut in May 2018 as a member of the boy group SPECTRUM. Before his debut, he participated in the survival show 'MIXNINE' where he finished 21st place.

On July 27th of 2018, months after his debut, Dongyoon passed away.
